title: JSON Schema Validator
description: Implement a basic JSON schema validator that validates data objects against a simple schema definition supporting required fields and type checking.
requirements: Takes two parameters: data object and schema definition
Collect all validation errors, not just first one

few_shot_examples.prompt: Implement a function to check if an object has all required properties.
Implement a type checking function for JavaScript values.
Validate an email address format and return errors.
